mapper.insert: insert into review_tb (reviewContent, reviewScore, userIndex, prdIndex) values(#{reviewContent}, #{reviewScore}, #{userIndex}, #{prdIndex})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review_tb r, user_tb u where r.userIndex = u.userIndex and prdIndex = #{prdIndex} order by reviewDate desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
select count(*) as total from review_tb where prdIndex = #{prdIndex}
select count(*) from review_tb where userIndex = #{userIndex} and prdIndex = #{prdIndex}
mapper.update: update review_tb set reviewContent = #{reviewContent}, reviewScore = #{reviewScore} where reviewIndex = #{reviewIndex}
mapper.select: select distinct p.prdIndex, p.prdRname, p.prdPrice, r.reviewIndex, r.reviewDate from order_item_tb oi left join order_tb o on oi.orderIndex = o.orderIndex left join size_tb s on oi.sizeIndex = s.sizeIndex left join product_tb p on s.prdIndex = p.prdIndex left join review_tb r on r.prdIndex = p.prdIndex where o.userIndex = #{userIndex}
